body.raw:
I am a student of Systems Engineering at UTN (Universidad Tecnol贸gica Nacional), set to graduate in 2025. I am concurrently engaged in entrepreneurship in Villa Carlos Paz, C贸rdoba, Argentina. 

Here's a snapshot of who I am and what I do:
- I am actively involved in the management of a co-founded with my mom a business called [ROHI Sommiers](https://www.rohisommiers.com), it specializes in the sale of mattresses and related industry products.
- I live in C贸rdoba Capital, C贸rdoba, Argentina.

I draw inspiration from insightful thinkers such as:
    - [Paul Graham](http://www.paulgraham.com/articles.html) for entrepreneurial wisdom.
    - [Andrew Ng](https://www.andrewng.org/) for cutting-edge AI and ML insights.
    - [Andrew Huberman](https://www.hubermanlab.com/) for his captivating neuroscientific research.
    - [Warren Buffet](https://www.berkshirehathaway.com/letters/letters.html) for timeless and contrarian investment principles.
    - [Guillermo Rauch](https://rauchg.com/) for innovative frontend development ideas.

My current interests are related to the realms of Deep Learning, AI advancements, Open Source, and the art of crafting engaging Frontend experiences.
